This site is designed to help current and future web publishers on campus, by providing an introduction to Web Services and resources and documents to help support the College Web Strategy.
Web Services is part of the Learning Information Services and has been brought together to fulfil the institution's need for consistent high-quality internal and external web communications.
The team is responsible for the overall production of the College's internal and external
column2: communications on the web, ensuring that the web marketing strategy of the College is optimised.
